quotes.quote: Remember always your end, and that lost time does not return.
Return good for good; return evil with justice.
Come back to yourself. Return to the voice of your body. Trust that much.
It is most unusual to return to a place that has changed in ways you yourself have altered.
Something once lost will never return.
The return makes one love the farewell.
We must return to nature and nature's god.
When much is taken, something is returned.
In the woods we return to reason and faith.
To return to nature is to embrace extinction.
Return to the root and you will find the meaning.
In the life of one man, never The same time returns.
Life comes from the earth and life returns to the earth.
Love others and as you do, that love will return to you.
When man will return to nature, nature will return to him.
The development of man is a return to an original perfection.
If you say hard things you must expect to hear them in return.
The return we reap from generous actions is not always evident.
To love is to return to a home we never left, to remember who we are.
The true return to nature is the definitive return to the elements-death.
One may return to the place of his birth, He cannot go back to his youth.
The truest indication of gratitude is to return what you are grateful for.
Once you hear something, you can never return to the time before you heard it.
The essence of love is to give continually, without expecting anything in return.
The true test of faith is how we treat those who can do nothing for us in return.
When the light returns to its source, it takes nothing of what it has illuminated.
You may return here once you have fully come to understand that you are always here.
You go away for a long time and return a different person - you never come all the way back.
For whoever knows how to return a kindness he has received must be a friend above all price.
The words can not return.
